original_text:
Some went out on the sea in ships;
    they were merchants on the mighty waters.
korean_text: 배들을 바다에 띄우며 큰 물에서 일을 하는 자는

sentences.original_text: Some went out on the sea in ships
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이들은 배를 타고 바다로 나갔으며

sentences.original_text: they were merchants on the mighty waters
